input: The shares of Activision Blizzard Inc. (ATVI, -0.37%) fell 0.3% in premarket trading on Monday, after the video game company, with franchises including "Call of Duty," "Warcraft" and "Candy Crush," reported first-quarter profit and revenue that missed expectations. The company, which announced in January a $69 billion acquisition deal with Microsoft Corp.
